definition: to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist
to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)

sentences.english: For example: R1 service door upper guide and door latch on doorframe is worn.
sentences.chinese: R1服務門上導軌和門框的門閂陳舊並且磨損。

sentences.english: The wear-out of plane tyres is serious and should be replaced periodically.
sentences.chinese: 由於飛機輪胎磨損快，要求經常更換。

sentences.english: CSE Cutter delays the onset of fracturing and cutter wear.
sentences.chinese: CSE齒延緩切削齒的破裂和磨損。

sentences.english: Idling for long periods in cold weather can actually cause excessive engine wear.
sentences.chinese: 冷天時的長時間怠速會造成發動機過分磨損。

sentences.english: Well, the speedometer is worn out.
With direction index, sapphire cover lens, never abrasion.
sentences.chinese: 帶有方向標，藍寶石鏡頭，永不磨損。

sentences.english: Sealing ring can be replaced after being worn out, which is to reduce the maintenance cost in operation.
sentences.chinese: 密封環磨損後可以更換，減少了運行維護費用。

sentences.english: Eutectic composition should be adopted for high-Cr white cast iron used under high-stress impact abrasion condition.
sentences.chinese: 高應力衝擊磨料磨損時，高鉻白口鑄鐵應選共晶成分。

sentences.english: Threaded holes and studs shall be in good condition and not damaged or worn in any way.
sentences.chinese: 有螺紋的孔和螺栓應完好，並無任何毀壞或磨損。

sentences.english: The chuck, in a sealed construction, may work for long life with wear-resistant parts.
sentences.chinese: 卡盤結構封閉式，零件耐磨損，使用壽命長。

sentences.english: Unique flat diaphragm design reduces wear and tear for long service life.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的皮膜設計減少磨損，延長工作壽命。

sentences.english: Duble frequency conversion struchre, simplfied structure. easy to maintain, less wear and "long time".
sentences.chinese: 雙變頻簡約機械結構，易維護，磨損少，壽命長。

sentences.english: Dual goring and slip-on style for easy no-hassle wear.
sentences.chinese: 雙戈林和風格上滑，容易無爭議的磨損。

sentences.english: Walter Lorenz recommends that all instruments be regularly inspected for wear and disfigurement.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾特洛倫茨外科公司建議定期檢查磨損和缺陷情況。

sentences.english: Bucket cutting edges of abrasive-resistant steel of up to 500 Brinell.
sentences.chinese: 剷鬥切削刀刃爲抗磨料磨損鋼材，布氏硬度達500。

definition: deformation/to become deformed/to change shape/to morph
to drop off/to come off/to lose (hair etc)/to omit (a character when writing)
loose/slack/(fig.) to soften (policies, tone of voice)/to give some slack/(of a place) not crowded
to stretch taut/(of muscles etc) taut/strained/tense
